post.body: Well, maybe not dumb. But it's certainly sloppy. I'd like more of an action shot, too...
Don't think that'll work with my collection. Need a trip to Ikea, methinks.
Too bad you can't e-mail cookies. I'd be glad to take them off your hands... ;)
How often do the answers you're given for that question make you shake your head in disbelief?
I got a great gift from my cousin, a t-shirt saying 'despite the look on my face, you're still talking?' Great for dealing with my dad. :p
Considering switching to SEOPosition theme for coldacid.net... Anyone got experiences they'd like to share about this theme?
I need a good profile picture, one that doesn't look dumb.
Sleep now. G'night twitterverse, see you in the morning!
Wish I had asked for shelving units for Christmas. I have stacks of books all over my floor.
I feel exhausted. Will be livelier tomorrow, I promise. Got a website I'm looking at for a blog post for tomorrow, too.
Prepping Christmas photos for Facebook.
Home from Christmas with the family. Great time had by all, and I'm stuffed enough to last me to New Year's.
And I'm out until Saturday, probably. Enjoy!
Actually, my cousin might have to fight one of my brothers for the honour of killing me. I'll use the confusion to escape them both.
My cousin Heather is going to kill me when she sees the card I got her. It's worth it, though.
Handling Christmas cards. The worst part of this time of year. I hate having to give cards.
I wish I could get sponsors for coldacid.net, that'd be pretty sweet. Unfortunately I'm not that popular. YET.
New blog post: Four services FriendFeed should add right away http://tinyurl.com/8wasku
Currently working on a blog post about services I'd like seen added to FriendFeed ASAP. Taking longer than expected.
I wish there was some prepackaged social kit for ASP.NET so I could get on to developing the meat of my project.
